caption: The video is first about a group of criminals killing people and committing crimes, then turn into a group of little bastards fighting with each other on the street. Many people witness the chaos, and they even attack the police. Later, a more professional police arrived. He is tall, strong and well-fleshed. He knock down those bastard easily and return to police station to talk with his coworkers about a new case. Then, he goes to hospital to investigate the case. By the way, he shortly greets his girlfriend. Finally at night, he goes to a nightclub and tries to get more information about the case.
